remarks: A necessary and sufficient condition for the product of two projectors to be a projector is that the projectors commute.  Part 1 of Theorem 1 of [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 65.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjclem1.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjclem1.2 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjcmul1i $p |- ( ( ( projh ` G ) o. ( projh ` H ) ) = ( ( projh ` H ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) <-> ( ( projh ` G ) o. ( projh ` H ) ) e. ran projh ) $.
